mapper.select: select dm_no as dmNo, sender, receiver, dm_content as dmContent, to_char(dm_time, 'mm-dd hh24:mi:ss') as dmTime, read_status as readStatus from dm where sender=#{memberId} or receiver=#{memberId} order by 1 desc
select count(*) from dm where receiver = #{memberId} and read_status = 'N'
